description: 16x2 character LCD display module with I2C interface, negative white characters on blue backlight, built‑in contrast adjustment, backlight control via firmware or jumper, 5V supply.
application_examples: Arduino projects requiring a compact text display

specifications.interface: I2C (PCF8574/PCF8574AT) to 4‑bit LCD data and control lines

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect SDA to Arduino SDA, SCL to Arduino SCL, VCC to 5V, GND to GND. Backlight can be enabled via firmware or a jumper wire.

online_resources: Complete Guide to Arduino LCD Interfacing (PDF)
source_document: Handson Technology User Guide for I2C Serial Interface 1602 LCD Module
